summary: After upsetting the criminal underground in 'the Master Blackmailer' case, Sherlock Holmes has to face his archenemy: Prof. Moriarty.
cast: Vasiliy Livanov|Vitali Solomin|Rina Zelyonaya|Borislav Brondukov|Valentina Panina|Viktor Yevgrafov|Boris Ryzhukhin|Boris Klyuev|Nikolai Kryukov|Aleksey Kozhevnikov|Ignat Leyrer|Igor Andronnikov|Igor Dmitriev|Anatoliy Podshivalov|Yury Eller|Dima Khrilev|Aleksandr Zakharov|E. Kharkevich|Irina Kraslavskaya|Vladimir Markov|Valeri Smolyakov
title: Smertelnaya skhvatka
